channel.title: TORBROWSER Crash after new Update
channel.description:
Hello, today after new update of Tor Browser , they cannot start anymore.
Error:
> **ERROR**: Tor Browser ended with non-zero (error) exit code! > > Tor Browser was started with: > > /home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/start-tor-browser --verbose --allow-remote > > Tor Browser exited with code: 126 > OPEN_LINK_CONFIRMATION_COUNTER: 0 > > To see this for yourself, you could try: > > Start Menu → System → Xfce Terminal > Then run: > /home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/start-tor-browser --verbose --allow-remote > > See online documentation:
Anyone solve the issue?

item.title: TORBROWSER Crash after new Update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
tsvetkovsecurity:

Start Menu → System → Xfce Terminal
Then run:
/home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/start-tor-browser --verbose --allow-remote

I suggest doing exactly that.

tsvetkovsecurity:

See online documentation:

I suggest doing exactly that too.

Read full topic

item.title: TORBROWSER Crash after new Update
item.dc:creator: tsvetkovsecurity
item.description:
Hello, today after new update of Tor Browser , they cannot start anymore.

Error:

ERROR: Tor Browser ended with non-zero (error) exit code!

Tor Browser was started with:

/home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/start-tor-browser --verbose --allow-remote

Tor Browser exited with code: 126
OPEN_LINK_CONFIRMATION_COUNTER: 0

To see this for yourself, you could try:

Start Menu → System → Xfce Terminal
Then run:
/home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/start-tor-browser --verbose --allow-remote

See online documentation:

Anyone solve the issue?

Read full topic
